data.name: Renova
data.detailed_description:
Delve into harrowing dungeons, scour long-forgotten ruins from ancient realms, and battle legendary foes. The world of Renova beckons knightly heroes to come forth and vanquish its evil - the time is Nye!

Overview


Renova is a tactical Action-RPG that seeks to provide an innovative experience in gameplay and visual style. A refreshing take on the Action-RPG genre, we introduce a tactical combat system, robust multiplayer modes, and nostalgic fantasy aesthetic.

Game Features


Chief among the game’s unique attributes is the Per Frame Combat System. This system segments all player actions, such as attacking, defending, moving and spell-casting, into 1 to 3 second time frames. Players must be wary of how to time their strikes, what decisions to make next, and how to properly predict enemy moves. Distinguished from any run-of-the-mill hack and slash combat, this is the combat that challenges the player, demanding one to be fully immersed and aware of the actions.



The world of Renova has depth and expanse. We have a passion to bring it to life and to offer the players a remarkable experience.



We look forward to you venturing the world of Renova with us!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or ADM equivalent of 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD Ryzen 7 of 4.3 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
